QuestData.Title: WANTED: Tojek
QuestData.Description:
<This appears to be a list of threats in the immediate vicinity, a angry scribble grabs your attention.>
A reward of gold be promised to de one dat slays da creature Tojek. You know what dey say, an eye for an eye!
-Rovash
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Rovash's last encounter with Tojek left him with a permanent injury.
